"About this Quest":
"To clear this quest, you must defeat the boss in the final area.

Every time you complete a \"Point Collection Quest\", you will earn Quest-Linked Boost points based on your quest rank and your result rank. As you score points, the boost level will rise and the boost effect associated with the linked quest will increase.

"In this quest, you cannot receive the items dropped by enemies until you clear the quest.

When you clear the quest, the items will be available at the end area."
